manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This is a second washing machine belonging to your household, specifically designed for intimate garments such as underwear, lingerie, and socks that require separate washing. It has a rated washing capacity of approximately 1KG (2.2LB) and a rated power of only 60W. If supplied with a voltage of 110V, it would also be a great choice for outdoor RVs and camping.

STANDARD: This program automatically fills and drains water, with 1 wash cycle and 3 rinse cycles. It is recommended for washing a larger amount of dirtier clothes. It takes 30 minutes to finish washing. FAST: This program automatically fills and drains water, with 1 wash cycle and 2 rinse cycles. It is recommended for washing a smaller amount of less dirty clothes. It takes 20 minutes to finish washing. SPIN-DRAIN: This program only drains water from the clothes, removing most of the water so that clothes are no longer dripping wet. Please note that it does not achieve the same drying effect as a large washing machine. It takes 6 minutes to finish washing. MANUAL: This program requires manual filling of water, with 1 wash cycle and automatic draining after completion. LEVEL DRAIN: High Water Level: Approximate water intake of 9.5 liters per cycle.Medium Water Level: Approximate water intake of 7.5 liters per cycle.Low Water Level: Approximate water intake of 5.5 liters per cycle.
Upgraded automatic mini folding washing machine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a fast spin cycle like a regular machine.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to make my vacations a little easier. When we go, we are gone for 10 or more days. I usually end up washing socks, etc, in the sink or tub, then twist squeeze the items in a towel to get the bulk of the water out and hang to dry in the shower. I tested it on face masks from covid. It's not hard to open. I didn't hook it up to the faucet, just put it in my walk in shower. I could only put in about four masks, so if the item you put in is too big, you may have to put less in the machine. This is mostly determined by how much you can put in the spin basket. The only problem I have is that there is no way to put the basket in the machine for storage, even thought the basket collapses. If you take it on vacation, you have to be careful how you pack it. Otherwise, I have hopes that I won't have to do the personal items by hand in a sink that doesn't have a stopper. Will update the review after my next trip, which isn't until May.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The drain basket keep loose out, no matter I try push into the washerI received the replacement and the much better. But honestly I don’t think it really a 1kg load. Since it not even can wash a bathing towel,need to use back the regular machine.An update: even I receive a replacement still the drain basket will never secure the machine. It’s a trash. Will never recommend friend or anyone to get this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does the job. Slow. A couple of items at a time, but for the space in an emergency. You can wash your pants or shirt for work with out going anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Enough to wash 2 to 3 pcs; decent washing cycle; Missing T-connector, bad post-purchase service
reviews.reviewText: This foldable washer is more bulky but big enough to hold 1 to 2 pcs depends on what you wash; the machine didn't come with the T-connector, we had been ONLY using the manual mode: pouring water by ourselves but it drained automatically; definitely missing its main feature: auto washing modes.The user manual only mentioned a T-connector should be use and soon as realizing no T-connector, we contacted Swiss Global the seller. It usually took 1-2 days to receive a reply; after emphasizing we only had 2.5 weeks to Amazon's A-Z protection deadline, it said the missing part would be mailed from China (taking about 2 weeks) and it would be relayed to us soon as arriving in USA. However the seller made it difficult and stressful for us to receive the missing part: despite Swiss Global received it on Thursday, it was waited until the following Monday afternoon to mail it out claiming Post Office wouldn't open during weekend but it was opened on Saturday. Thus we only received the part a day before the Amazon protection expired, we did not have enough time to try the auto-wash-auto-drain feature. Returning the machine because of: Dry basket fell off mostly of the time during the Spin Dry cycle, Quick Water Inlet can't be taken out after plug in so difficult to pack for travelling, and very poor post-purchase service (while still under Amazon's protection; if without this, who know if Swiss Global would be care enough to reply).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my mother AND for the RV
reviews.reviewText: My mother is older and has trouble with the stairs these days. The laundry is in the basement. I purchased this mini clothes washer for her, and she now does many of her clothes in her bathroom without having to negotiate the stairs as much. She was happy enough to convince me to get one for the RV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works good with socks and small stuff animals.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ir was delivered on time and it is much more cute than I expected. My daughter loves it very much. She is going to use it to wash her own small bedding things and her little stuffed animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not fully automatic!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because it was advertised as fully automatic. Which it's not.There was no tee adapter as stated in the description. The manual also shows a tee adapter is included in the contents. Which it wasn't.This is a step above handwashing, nothing more. I'll be returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It work great for the small load. Save time, portable and convenient. Recommended.Updates July 15/2023: I was so impressed with this unit. I told one of my relatives about it and he requested me to order one for him since he don’t have prime. Today I went to help him set-up. We decided to do test run. After one cycle was over it started pulling water again but as it pull water it started draining immediately. I thought water might stop draining after sometime but it keep draining. Restarted, unplugged, water pressure brought down, did several other try but nothing could fix. Supper frustrated and kinda embarrassed . My relatives might be thinking that it might not be good product. I reordered another one for him. I’m kind worried this time. Hope they send me good and working unit.
